ai_description: --> is a mushroom that, upon touching the top, extrudes a spike and causes skin to boil if it pierces you, The spike only activates if you touch the top, therefore it is advised that you should only touch the stem of this mushroom. The has useful alchemical properties.
description: A mushroom that, upon touching the top, extrudes a spike and causes skin to boil if it pierces you. The spike only activates if you touch the top, therefore it is advised that you should only touch the stem of this mushroom. The Skewer Belle has useful alchemical properties.
name: Skewer Belle
